item.title: Explore undiscovered beauty of Detroit
item.description: Many people overlook Detroit's charm and impressive buildings, but there is a lot to explore if you know where to go. This Detroit Architecture Walking Tour takes you to well-known areas and hidden gems to see some of the city's architectural must-sees like Hart Plaza's Horace E. Dodge Fountain. Plus, you'll even access buildings where entry is exclusive to this tour.

image.alt: Explore undiscovered beauty of Detroit

item.title: Half-Day Classic Food Tour in Ann Arbor with Lunch
item.description: Discover the thriving food scene of Kerrytown and downtown Ann Arbor on a half-day food tour with a food-loving guide. You might sample foods from Korean, Italian, Cuban, and Mexican culinary traditions, then top off the savory samples with a dessert treat. Enjoy enough tastings to make up a full meal, and meet the chefs at some of the stops.

image.alt: Half-Day Classic Food Tour in Ann Arbor with Lunch

item.title: Self Guided "Detroit's Spirit and History" Solo Walking Tour
item.description: Discover the tumultuous history of Detroit as you embark on a self-guided walking tour. Follow the route on the app to see the main highlights and hidden gems of the city. Walk past historic buildings, through artistic alleys, across world-class parks, and stop at fun food spots, learning about each location from your information app.

image.alt: Self Guided "Detroit's Spirit and History" Solo Walking Tour

item.title: SEA LIFE Michigan Aquarium Admission Ticket
item.description: Experience the magic of underwater world as you make your way from the Great Lakes of Michigan to the depths of the SEA LIFE Michigan Aquarium. Enjoy an afternoon—or an entire day—of informative talks, interactive exhibits, animal feeding shows, and more. Discover the thrill of seeing blacktip reef sharks and gentle seahorses. Kids can also enjoy learning more about the underwater habitats of sea creatures.

image.alt: SEA LIFE Michigan Aquarium Admission Ticket

item.title: LEGOLAND® Discovery Center Michigan Admission Ticket
item.description: LEGOLAND® Discovery Center Michigan is an imaginative, indoor destination in the Auburn Hills designed for children aged three to 10. With all-day admission, you can see the magic in the LEGO® Factory, explore kid-sized Miniland, create a lightning-fast LEGO race car, and experience a 4D theater.

image.alt: LEGOLAND® Discovery Center Michigan Admission Ticket

item.title: Motor City Ghosts: Haunts, Spirits, and Poltergeists Walking Tour
item.description:
Join us on a captivating journey with Detroit's top-rated Ghost Tour, where the supernatural blends seamlessly with the city's rich history. This immersive walking tour invites you to uncover the chilling secrets hidden in the shadows of Motor City. Accompanied by expert local guides, you'll hear spine-tingling stories about the spirits that continue to haunt the streets.
With a knowledgeable local expert at your side, you'll explore eerie tales that have left an indelible mark on this vibrant metropolis. From the opulent interiors of The Whitney to the majestic Masonic Temple, each stop reveals a chapter of Detroit's dark past, filled with infamous figures and the grim events that shaped the city.
By focusing on outdoor hotspots, this tour offers a broader exploration of the city's haunted landscape. Whether you're a history enthusiast or a ghost lover, Detroit's #1 Ghost Tour promises an evening filled with authentic ghost stories and a hauntingly enjoyable experience!

image.alt: Motor City Ghosts: Haunts, Spirits, and Poltergeists Walking Tour

item.title: Outdoor Escape Room in Detroit - Downtown
item.description:
An immersive clue-solving adventure around downtown Detroit. Search for real-world clues, solve puzzles, and discover the neighborhood with an experience you'll never forget!
Reschedule anytime with no fees.
It's a scavenger hunt, escape room, and urban crawl all-in-one. Follow the storyline around town as you find clues and use them to crack codes. Then enter solutions on the app to find out where to go next. Clues can be anywhere - murals, statues, landmarks, and more!
Plan on about two hours of playtime, depending on your experience level and how much time you spend exploring along the way. Difficulty level is adjustable - take as many or as few hints as you’d like!
Note: Bookings made a week or more in advance receive their kit in the mail. Bookings made less than a week in advance will pick up their kit at the start point on the day of the adventure.

image.alt: Outdoor Escape Room in Detroit - Downtown

item.title: Detroit Drunks of Antiquity Historic Bar Tour
item.description:
The most popular bar tour in Detroit’s history is on the road again. We’ll stop at some of Detroit’s oldest, most notorious and most interesting bars, sharing stories along the way- over a few pints, of course. Picks up in BOTH Ferndale and Detroit.
Ever since Detroit was a mere French missionary outpost, the city’s history has been entwined with the story of its citizens’ drinking habits.
Countless stories have been shared over a pint, and a majority of the city’s major moments featured alcohol front and center: the early frontier day’s wild revelry, through the bloody freewheeling days of the Purple Gang & National Prohibition and beyond.
Detroit’s got some serious chops when it comes to drinking history. So let’s go to that bar that’s been around since 1874.
Or that one that predates World War One. Actually, loads of Detroit bars are older than your grandparents, and we’re visiting as many as we can in the limited time we have.

image.alt: Detroit Drunks of Antiquity Historic Bar Tour

item.title: Detroit City Scavenger Hunt by Operation City Quest
item.description: Have fun with the whole family taking part in a scavenger hunt in Detroit. Use the app to collect points based on what you see across the city and the tasks you complete along the way. If you need any help, your remote guide will help you complete the game via chat. Check your score to see how you measure up against others playing the game in Detroit and beyond.

image.alt: Detroit City Scavenger Hunt by Operation City Quest

item.title: Self-Guided Ann Arbor Scavenger Hunt: Ann Arbor Adventure
item.description: Whether you’re new to Ann Arbor or want to mix up your typical routine, a mobile scavenger app is the perfect way to add some excitement to your time in the city. Using a smartphone, your team will solve challenging questions that lead you to the next clue. Along the way, see and learn about some of the city's most famous and lesser known landmarks.

image.alt: Self-Guided Ann Arbor Scavenger Hunt: Ann Arbor Adventure

item.title: Detroit Tigers Baseball Game Ticket at Comerica Park
item.description:
Watching a Detroit Tigers game at Comerica Park is an unforgettable experience. The stadium's modern design and intimate setting provide great views of the field from every seat. The energy of the crowd is contagious, and the sounds of the game, from the crack of the bat to the roar of the crowd, create a thrilling atmosphere. Whether you're a die-hard fan or just there for the experience, a Tigers game at Comerica Park is a must-see for anyone eager to live like a real Detroit local for a day!
Seating categories are based on location and proximity to the field. Premium & Regular category seats generally sit along the 3rd baseline, behind home base or along the first base line. Premium seats are closer to the field. Whereas seats in the Budget seating category are generally higher up and in the outfield.

image.alt: Detroit Tigers Baseball Game Ticket at Comerica Park

item.title: Best Downtown Detroit Historical Walking Tour
item.description: The best way to see a place is by foot. In this tour, we will explore the history of Detroit by visiting culturally significant attractions. This tour will have short stops at each attraction that will give you time to learn about its history and to take pictures. The duration varies depending on how long the party wants to spend at each site. This is a fun guided walking tour that will have several stops along the way, including Huntington Place, the Guardian Building, and the Book Tower. Your guide is an experienced local who excels at storytelling and historical knowledge. We hope to see you on this super cool walking tour of the city of Detroit!

image.alt: Best Downtown Detroit Historical Walking Tour

item.title: 75 Minutes Detroit River, Belle Isle Breeze Electric Cruise
item.description:
The Sycorax proudly offers the only 100% electric boat cruises in Southeast Michigan. No emissions. No fumes. No noise. Just pure and peaceful fun on Detroit's incomparable waterways.
On the Belle Isle Breeze, passengers will relax in comfort and style for a 75-minute cruise around Belle Isle, one of the most popular urban parks in the U.S. Other sights include the beautiful Windsor waterfront, tranquil Peche Island, Lake Saint Clair, and the historic mansions bordering the Detroit riverfront.
All cruises include a captain and first mate to ensure impeccable service and provide insider knowledge on Belle Isle and one of the world's busiest waterways. The cutting-edge Sycorax features booth-style seating with a teak table in the stern, ample bow seating, an award-winning sound system, and a private head.
The Belle Isle Breeze is perfect for adults and children alike, as well as tourists and veteran Detroiters.
Cruises depart from Stanton Yards near downtown Detroit.

image.alt: 75 Minutes Detroit River, Belle Isle Breeze Electric Cruise

item.title: Central London To & From Heathrow Airport Private Transfer
item.description: Searching for efficient and dependable taxi services and airport transfers? Look no further than your ultimate solution for seamless transportation in and around London. With a commitment to excellence, We offer a comprehensive range of services, including local taxi rides, airport transfers, and more. Our fleet comprises a diverse selection of vehicles, ensuring that your journey is both comfortable and tailored to your preferences. Whether you require a swift ride to the airport, a luxury chauffeur service, or a quick cab booking, we have you covered. Experience stress-free travel with our user-friendly booking platform and competitive rates. Discover the convenience of reliable transportation today!

image.alt: Central London To & From Heathrow Airport Private Transfer

item.title: Detroit Red Wings Ice Hockey Game Ticket at Little Caesars Arena
item.description:
Step inside Little Caesar’s Arena for your chance to experience one of the most storied franchises in NHL history, where tradition, passion, and high-level hockey intersect. The Detroit Red Wings and their fans encapsulate the blue-collar, hard-working and passionate identity of the Motor City!
As one of the most successful teams in the NHL, the Wings maintain a commitment to playing the game the "Detroit way"—with an emphasis on both finesse and grit. Today, the team is on the rise, with exciting young talents ushering in a new era of Red Wings hockey. Fans are treated to an exhilarating brand of hockey that blends the team’s historic legacy with a fresh, dynamic outlook.
As the name suggests, Little Caesar’s Arena serves some of the best Detroit-style pizza you will ever find! Added to this the arena’s amazing midtown location, surrounded by the city’s best restaurants and attractions such as the Mo-Town museum, there is a full day’s worth of excitement in attending a Pistons game!

image.alt: Detroit Red Wings Ice Hockey Game Ticket at Little Caesars Arena

item.title: Detroit Lions Football Game Ticket at Ford Field
item.description:
The only non-expansion team in the NFL to never make a Super Bowl, it’s hard to argue that any fanbase in the NFL has endured harder times than the Detroit Lions’ fanbase. Yet as the saying goes “Hard times create strong men, strong men create good times” - when it comes to the electric Lions fans, that saying has never been truer!
Despite their rough history, the sun is starting to shine on the men in Honolulu Blue. Fortunes have turned of late and the Lions are one of the favourites to make the Super Bowl this year! The exhilarating football on the field is matched by the energy in the stands, creating one of the best game day atmospheres in the NFL.
Ford Field is a gem in the heart of downtown Detroit, combining sleek architecture with historic elements, like its original features from the old Hudson’s warehouse. Its location offers the perfect hub for travellers to explore the best of downtown Detroit and experience the delights the city has to offer.

image.alt: Detroit Lions Football Game Ticket at Ford Field

item.title: Private Downtown Detroit Helicopter Ride
item.description: Take to the sky with an incredible private helicopter ride across Downtown Detroit. As you buzz over the city, admire sights like Detroit Ambassador Bridge, Ford Field, and the Renaissance Centre. Along the way, listen to insightful commentary from your pilot via a handy headset and snap photos as unique souvenirs of your time in Detroit.

image.alt: Private Downtown Detroit Helicopter Ride

item.title: Fishing Detroit
item.description:
FUN fishing! Try new techniques and fisheries like vertical jigging walleye on the Detroit River, casting hardware to white bass, and fly fishing the flats of Lake Saint Clair.
No pressure or stress; if a fish flops off that's AOK. If the hook gets snagged, no big deal. I fish for FUN.

image.alt: Fishing Detroit

item.title: Detroit Dash Scavenger Hunt
item.description: Get ready to undertake a Detroit scavenger hunt quest, where you and your private group work together to solve clues and undertake challenges, learning about Detroit the entire time. Bring your entire family, and your dog, since this tour welcomes all ages and canines. If you get stuck, speak to your remote, live guide, and then carry on fulfilling your quest.

image.alt: Detroit Dash Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Detroit Roll Through Motor City
item.description: Discover the attractions of Detroit with your friends on a mobile scavenger hunt. Using your smartphone, your team will follow clues to landmarks around the city including Comerica Park, Library Park, Hart Plaza, and Campus Martius Park. Along the way, learn about local history, art, and culture. Whether you’re a first-time visitor or call the Motor City home, this is the perfect opportunity to get to know Detroit.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Detroit Roll Through Motor City

item.title: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Detroit by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Zombie Scavengers in Detroit challenges your team to survive a zombie apocalypse! The game instructs you to find a variety of items to survive the apocalypse anywhere in the city you'd like via an app. Get points for finding survival items (in any order you want) and participating in exciting zombie themed tasks. Plan your survival adventure carefully in order to get the most points to survive! A remote host will be following along (virtually) and help if you need it via chat. Come survive with us in Detroit today!

image.alt: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Detroit by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Shaanxi Archaeological Museum English-speaking Guide Service

image.alt: Shaanxi Archaeological Museum English-speaking Guide Service

item.title: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Detroit by Wacky Walks
item.description: See the sights of the Motor City and have some laughs along the way on a self-guided scavenger hunt. Whether it’s your first time visiting Detroit or you’re a longtime local, this mobile game is the perfect way to experience the city from an alternative perspective. Your group will follow clues and complete challenges to gain points. Along the way, a remote live representative is available to offer assistance.

image.alt: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Detroit by Wacky Walks

item.title: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Ann Arbor by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Survive an apocalypse in Ann Arbor today with Zombie Scavengers! An app will provide you with a list of items needed to survive the zombies. Find these items in any order you'd like and perform fun zombie themed challenges for points. Come up with a system to get the most points in order to survive the zombie apocalypse. Your friendly remote host will help you throughout the game via chat. Get enough points to survive the zombie apocalypse in Ann Arbor today!

image.alt: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Ann Arbor by Zombie Scavengers
